who_we_help.description: At Ardur Healthcare, we provide mental health billing services tailored to the unique needs of solo practitioners, group practices, and outpatient clinics.
providers: Psychiatrists: From medication management to evaluation codes, we handle the minor details of psychiatry billing.
Psychologists: Accurate billing services for psychological testing, therapy, and documentation-heavy services.
Therapists (LCSWs, LMFTs, LPCs): Proper time-based coding and modifier usage for therapy sessions.
Behavioral Health Clinics: Credentialing, claims submission, and denial management for multi-provider clinics.

faqs.q: What mental health specialties do you support?
faqs.a: We provide billing services for psychologists, psychiatrists, therapists (LCSWs, LPCs, LMFTs), and behavioral health clinics across the U.S.

faqs.q: How do you handle time-based therapy billing?
faqs.a: We ensure accurate CPT code selection and documentation review for all time-based psychotherapy sessions, including 90832, 90834, and 90837.

faqs.q: Can you bill both therapy and med management for the same day?
faqs.a: Yes. We ensure proper modifier usage and payer-specific guidelines to bill therapy and psychiatry services on the same date.

faqs.q: Do you support mental health billing for telehealth?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We follow payer-specific telehealth policies and use appropriate POS codes and modifiers for virtual visits.

faqs.q: What EHRs are you compatible with?
faqs.a: We integrate with most mental health EHRs, including TheraNest, SimplePractice, Valant, TherapyNotes, and others.

faqs.q: What services are covered under family practice billing?
faqs.a: We bill for a broad range of services, including preventive care, immunizations, acute illness visits, E/M services, chronic care management, and wellness screenings. Our billing ensures each service is coded correctly to meet payer requirements.

faqs.a: Yes. We offer billing solutions for solo family doctors, multi-provider clinics, Rural Health Clinics (RHCs), and FQHCs. Our team understands the unique billing models and payer structures that these clinics operate.

faqs.q: How do you help with E/M coding?
faqs.a: We apply accurate E/M levels based on time or medical decision-making. Our team also audits documentation to prevent undercoding or overcoding and ensures compliance with E/M guidelines.

faqs.q: Are you a family practice medical billing company?
faqs.a: Yes. Ardur Healthcare is a dedicated family practice medical billing company offering end-to-end revenue cycle management tailored to primary care providers and clinics of all sizes.

faqs.q: What makes your billing services different?
faqs.a: We combine specialty-specific expertise with payer rule tracking, personalized workflows, and denial analytics. Our clients typically see faster claim approvals and 15 - 30% higher collections within a few months.

faqs.q: Do you handle CPT coding for home visits?
faqs.a: Yes. We use correct CPT codes for home visits (e.g., 99341â€“99350) and HCPCS codes based on visit type and payer guidelines. We also apply appropriate modifiers and episode-level billing logic.

faqs.q: What makes your home health billing services different?
faqs.a: We specialize in home health billing and coding, understand PDGM billing cycles, and ensure your claims align with OASIS, POC, and visit documentation. Our clean claim rate exceeds 98%.

faqs.q: Do you support both Medicare and private payers?

who_we_help.description: We support physical therapy clinics, hospital-based rehab departments, SNF contract therapists, and mobile PT providers. Our billing services simplify Medicare compliance, CPT coding, and documentation checks.

faqs.q: What CPT codes do you handle in physical therapy billing?
faqs.a: We manage codes like 97110, 97112, 97140, 97530, 97035, and others, accurately distinguishing between time-based and modality procedures.

faqs.q: How do you ensure compliance with Medicare therapy billing?
faqs.a: We monitor cap thresholds, apply the KX modifier when necessary, and ensure documentation supports medical necessity and plan-of-care updates.

faqs.q: Can you integrate with my EMR like WebPT or PromptEMR?
faqs.a: Yes, we work with most leading physical therapy EMRs, ensuring a smooth data flow and claim processing experience.

faqs.q: What modifiers are required for PT billing?
faqs.a: GP is essential for PT services. We also manage modifier 59 for distinct services and KX for therapy cap exceptions when needed.

faqs.q: Do you help with audits or Medicare overpayment issues?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We support clients through payer audits, review documentation gaps, and ensure compliance to prevent overpayments or penalties.

who_we_help.description: We support massage therapists in clinical, rehab, and wellness-focused settings. From independent practitioners to integrated care providers, we help ensure compliant billing and faster reimbursements.
providers: Independent Massage Therapists: Insurance billing support for therapeutic sessions
Medical Massage Clinics: Claims for post-injury or post-op treatment

faqs.q: Can massage therapy be billed to insurance?
faqs.a: Yes, if the service is medically necessary and covered by the payer. We verify eligibility and ensure documentation meets insurance standards.

faqs.q: What CPT codes are used for massage therapy billing?
faqs.a: The most common codes are 97124 (therapeutic massage) and 97140 (manual therapy), depending on the service and diagnosis.

faqs.q: How do you help prove medical necessity?
faqs.a: We provide documentation templates and help ensure your notes, referrals, and diagnosis codes justify the treatment for coverage.

faqs.q: Can I bill massage therapy under another providerâ€™s NPI?
faqs.a: In integrated clinics, yes, such as billing under a chiropractor or physical therapist if allowed. We can guide you on the proper billing structure.

faqs.q: Do you support out-of-network or cash-based massage therapy billing?
faqs.a: Yes. We can generate superbills for patients or process OON claims for those seeking insurance reimbursement.
